name: Disney Cars Xrs Drag Racer
description: The Fisher-Price® Rollin’ Surprise Animals are sized just right for your baby to grasp and push for sit-at play or crawling fun. Each animal pal features a different activity for babies to discover, including a bell that rings, popping rattle beads, and a spinning cheese wheel. Plus, as the push-along vehicles roll, the clear back lets babies watch the gears turn. When they’re ready to move, baby can follow these rolling friends for exciting crawl-and-chase play! Collect them all! (Each sold separately and subject to availability.)
